title: Global Markets Show Signs of Stabilization After Tech Selloff
description: U.S. stock futures and European markets made small gains, though Asian markets fell in the fallout from Thursday’s tech selloff.
author: The Wall Street Journal
content:
Markets showed signs of stabilization early Friday after the Nasdaq index led U.S. declines in the prior session. - Spencer Platt/Getty Images

title: Tech Jitters Weigh on U.S. Stock Futures, Asian Indexes

author: Chelsey Dulaney
